amendment.description: To require an increase in the size of the defense acquisition and support workforce during fiscal years 2005, 2006, and 2007.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3212 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3212 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Byrd. (consideration: CR S5787-5788; text: CR S5787) To require an increase in the size of the defense acquisition and support workforce during fiscal years 2005, 2006, and 2007.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3212 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3212 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Byrd.
